Package edu.cs2430.assignment3

Class Course

java.lang.Object
edu.cs2430.assignment3.Course
public class Course extends Object
A class to represent a course.

At UU, a course is only allowed to have a maximum of five prerequisite courses. All prerequisite relationships are
AND relationships, meaning that all prerequisite courses must be satisfied in order to enroll in the postrequisite course.
A course in uniquely identifiable by its name and program

    • currentPrerequisiteIndex

      private int currentPrerequisiteIndex
      The current index for the array of prerequisite courses.
      This is required to keep track of where to insert the prerequisite course in the array.

    • MAX_PREREQUISITES

      private static final int MAX_PREREQUISITES
      A constant to represent the maximum size (5) of the prerequisite course array

      public Course(String name, int number, Program program, int numberOfCredits, Course[] prerequisiteCourses)

      Create a new array of length MAX_PREREQUISITES and copy over all elements of the prerequisiteCourses parameter
      Parameters:
      name - The course name
      number - The course number
      program - The program the course is in
      numberOfCredits - The number of credits for the course
      prerequisiteCourses - The prerequisite courses

    • addPrerequisiteCourse

      public boolean addPrerequisiteCourse(Course prerequisiteCourse)
      Adds the provided course to the prerequisite array.
      The prerequisite course must be a valid prerequisite course in order to be added.
      The function validateAddPrerequisiteCourse(edu.cs2430.assignment3.Course) determines if the prerequisite course is valid
      Parameters:
      prerequisiteCourse - The prerequisite course
      Returns:
      Returns true if the prerequisite course was added, false if the prerequisite course was not added

    • validateAddPrerequisiteCourse

      private boolean validateAddPrerequisiteCourse(Course prerequisiteCourse)
      Validates if the prerequisite course can be added to the current course.
      A prerequisite course is considered valid if all the following criteria are met
      • The prerequisite course cannot be null
      • The prerequisite course cannot have the same course name and program as the current course
      • The current course has fewer than five current prerequisite courses
      • The current course does not already have the course (same name and program) as a prerequisite
      Parameters:
      prerequisiteCourse - The prerequisite course to validate
      Returns:
      Return true if the prerequisite course is valid to add, false if the prerequisite course is not valid to add

    • containsPrerequisite

      public boolean containsPrerequisite(Course prerequisiteCourse)
      Checks to see if the prerequisite course already exists in the prerequisite course array
      Parameters:
      prerequisiteCourse - The prerequisite course
      Returns:
      Returns true if the prerequisite course already exists in the array, false if the prerequisite course does not already exist in the array

    • containsPrerequisiteCycle

      public boolean containsPrerequisiteCycle(Course prerequisiteCourse)
      Bonus challenge
      Checks to see if the prerequisite course creates a cycle with any of the other prerequisite courses or the current course
      Parameters:
      prerequisiteCourse - The prerequisite course
      Returns:
      Returns true if the prerequisite course creates a cycle, false if the prerequisite course does not create a cycle
